definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: A more serious talk can begin with a quotation or a thoughtful question.
sentences.chinese: 较严肃的主题可由一句引言或引人深思的问题开始。

sentences.english: This article is divided into three parts besides the introduction, approximately 35,000 characters.
sentences.chinese: 本文除引言外共分三部分，约三万五千字。

sentences.english: Besides the introduction and peroration, this article contains 5 chapters.
sentences.chinese: 本文除了引言和结语外，在结构上分为五章。

sentences.english: This article consists one epigraph and the other six chapters.
sentences.chinese: 本文由引言和六个章篇构成。

sentences.english: The production of deducing the inducement has been reduced after a newer introduction.
sentences.chinese: 在一个更新的引言之后推断诱因的结果已经减少。

sentences.english: Introduction will describe the significance of choosing the topic.
sentences.chinese: 引言部分将介绍选择本题目的意义。

sentences.english: The foreword part of the thesis overviews the present research situation of LuYin.
sentences.chinese: 本文在引言部分概述了庐隐目前的研究现状。

sentences.english: INTRODUCTION People often discuss literal translation and free translation.
sentences.chinese: 引言人们经常讨论直译和意译。

sentences.english: There are about 50,000 words with four chapters besides preface and postscript.
sentences.chinese: 本文除引言和结论外，共分四章，全文五万余字。

sentences.english: Full citations, except four parts, totaling more than thirty thousand words.
sentences.chinese: 全文除引言外，分四个部分，共计三万余字。

sentences.english: People often discuss literal translation and free translation.
sentences.chinese: 引言人们经常讨论直译和意译。

sentences.english: Main Street is the climax of Civilization, " he warned in a prefatory note."
sentences.chinese: “大街就是文明的顶峰，”他在引言性的题词中说。

sentences.english: Sometimes I start my students with this quote.
sentences.chinese: 我一般先用下面这句引言开始我的课。

sentences.english: Apart from introduction, this paper contains four chapters.
sentences.chinese: 本文除引言部分外包括四章。

definition: (often used in book or chapter titles) general introduction/overview
author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book
Book of Job (in the Old Testament)
sheet/piece of writing/bound set of bamboo slips used for record keeping (old)/classifier for written items: chapter, article
